page.title: 16RECREATION IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Most clubs meet in the centrally situated{Hockwold Village Centre.}The Women's Institute with 36 members meet there monthly. An over 60 club meets fortnightly. Brownies,Youth Club and Badminton Club meet weekly. An adjacent{playing field}is used by 2 football teams,adult & children. Hockwold{Social Club}has its own licensed premises,a bowling green and cricket pitch where members play friendly and league matches. Darts and Pool are played in the pub. The Parish Council run a "Best Kept Garden" comp. Members of a club for{Mentally Handi- {capped}meet in a private house. A Boys & Girls' Brigade connected with the church has just been formed. There is easy access to coarse fishing, riding, shooting & hare-coursing in the village.
